comments.body:
Please include a comment above the `license_file` line with the following url for a pull request to add the license file to the source distribution. This will be a reminder to check the status of whether it has been included in a future release so the manually added copy can be removed.

https://github.com/keis/base58/pull/55
My bad, I think it is included, it is just called copying. https://github.com/keis/base58/blob/master/COPYING (and like with eth-typing, I thought I would have to be included separately)

The `COPYING` file is not included in the source distribution (I just checked the tarball from pypi). If you could please add the comment in the `meta.yaml` that I requested, I'd be happy to merge this
Changed the tarball to github, which has the license file.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +38,42 @@  summary: Base58 and Base58Check implementation
  license: MIT
  license_file: COPYING 

extra:
